title: The Top 10 TV Shows of the Decade | The Watch
description:
Chris Ryan, Andy Greenwald, and Sam Esmail reflect on the past 10 years of television (1:00) before revealing their 10 favorite TV shows of the decade (27:48).

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald
Guests: Sam Esmail and Kaya McMullen

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
